content: **about this pattern** important this is a one-size-only pattern to keep it free i m providing you with the instructions and steps i followed to make these socks for me i have a size 8 foot women s australia and typically knit a medium/ large size sock with a cast on of 64 stitches if you have a larger or smaller foot my suggestion is you use another free sock pattern that caters to all sock sizes i ve suggested two in the pattern and replace their ankle and foot pattern with the one i ve detailed in this pattern **blocked gauge** 36 stitches over 4 /10cm 56 row over 4 /10cm **needle** 2 5mm 9 circular needle 2 5mm 40 circular needle for magic loop **yarn** skein sisters fabulous sock 80% australian extra fine superwash merino/ 20% nylon 400m/100g colour a flamboyance 108m/27g used colour b tango train 128m/32g used colour c lollipop 80m/20g used colour d anemone 80m/20g **other materials** 2 stitch markers tapestry needle for weaving in ends and sock blockers for shaping the finished socks **my foot size** 9 circumference of arch of foot and ankle i typically wear a size 8 women s shoe australian size
